names.pinyin: ma zhu feng fang shui xi ji

actions: Clears Damp-Heat and treats sores topically.
Strongly dries Dampness, tonifies the Spleen, induces sweating and expels Wind-Dampness.
Relieves toxicity, expels Wind and alleviates pain and itching topically.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, dries Dampness, promotes water metabolism, stabilizes the Exterior and stops sweating.
Regulates Qi, adjusts the Middle, relieves the diaphragm, dries Dampness and transforms Phlegm.
Dries Dampness, kills parasites and stops itching topically.
Disperses Wind, kills parasites and stops itching topically.

notes: Decoct in 1.5- 3 liters of water. When cool, wash the affected area for 20-30 minutes, 1-2 times/day. The warts should drop off in ten days.
